class.name: wxComboBox
class.description: A combobox is like a combination of an edit control and a listbox.

flag.name: wxCB_SIMPLE
flag.description: Creates a combobox with a permanently displayed list. Windows only.

flag.name: wxCB_DROPDOWN
flag.description: Creates a combobox with a drop-down list. MSW and Motif only.

flag.name: wxCB_READONLY
flag.description: A combobox with this style behaves like a wxChoice (and may look in the same way as well, although this is platform-dependent), i.e. it allows the user to choose from the list of options but doesn't allow to enter a value not present in the list.

flag.name: wxCB_SORT
flag.description: Sorts the entries in the list alphabetically.

flag.name: wxTE_PROCESS_ENTER
flag.description: The control will generate the event wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_ENTER (otherwise pressing Enter key is either processed internally by the control or used for navigation between dialog controls). Windows only.

int.name: selection
int.label: Selection
int.description: Index of the initially selected item or -1 for no selection (default: -1).

arraystring.name: content
arraystring.label: Content
arraystring.description: Content of the control; this property has any number of <item> XML elements as its children, with the items text as their text values (default: empty).

string.name: value
string.label: Value
string.description: Initial value in the control (doesn't have to be one of content values; default: empty).

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_COMBOBOX_SELECTED
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_COMBOBOX_SELECTED event, when an item on the list is selected. Note that calling GetValue() returns the new value of selection.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_UPDATED
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_UPDATED event, when the combobox text changes.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_ENTER
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_ENTER event, when RETURN is pressed in the combobox (notice that the combobox must have been created with wxTE_PROCESS_ENTER style to receive this event).

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_COMBOBOX_DROPDOWN
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_COMBOBOX_DROPDOWN event, which is generated when the list box part of the combo box is shown (drops down). Notice that this event is currently only supported by wxMSW and wxGTK with GTK+ 2.10 or later.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_COMBOBOX_CLOSEUP
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_COMBOBOX_CLOSEUP event, which is generated when the list box of the combo box disappears (closes up). This event is only generated for the same platforms as wxEVT_COMMAND_COMBOBOX_DROPDOWN above. Also note that only wxMSW supports adding or deleting items in this event.
